mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipes(name, image_path, recipe_source, servings, remark, favorite, created_at) values(#{name}, #{imagePath}, #{recipeSource}, #{servings}, #{remark}, #{favorite}, #{createdAt})
INSERT INTO ingredients(recipe_id, name, quantity, unit, arrange) values(#{recipeId}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{arrange})
INSERT INTO instructions(recipe_id, step_number, instruction, arrange) values(#{recipeId}, #{stepNumber}, #{instruction}, #{arrange})
mapper.update: UPDATE ingredients SET name=#{name}, quantity=#{quantity}, unit=#{unit}, arrange=#{arrange} WHERE id=#{id}
